name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **Vue.js**, and **AWS**, with a solid foundation in **Docker** for containerization. Demonstrated ability in both frontend and backend development with expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation. Experienced in deploying cloud-native solutions and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development adhering to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, focusing on model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
